title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers         Oregon Caves National Monument and Preserve visitor center. NPS Photo  Oregon Caves National Monument and Preserve Visitor Center 21000 Caves Highway, Cave Junction, OR 97523 Phone (541) 592-2100 Open daily. Hours vary according to season. Visitor information, cave tour tickets, exhibits about Oregon Caves and the Siskiyou Mountains, hands-on exhibits for kids, Junior Ranger programs, bookstore, and trail juncture for Cliff Nature Trail and Big Tree Trail.     Â      Illinois Valley Visitor Center in Cave Junction. NPS Photo  Illinois Valley Visitors Center 201 Caves Highway, Cave Junction, OR 97523 Phone (541) 592-4076 Open daily. Hours vary according to season. Information and trip planning advice for all wilderness users, including current cave tour information, exhibits about area geology and cultural history, weather conditions, campgrounds, local attractions, and businesses.
